verses.verse: So Israel <S%H3478><s%> set <S%H5265><s%> out with all <S%H3605><s%> that he had, and came <S%H935><s%> to Beersheba, <S%H884><s%> and offered <S%H2076><s%> sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> to the God <S%H430><s%> of his father Isaac. <S%H1><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Israel <S%H3478><s%> in visions <S%H4759><s%> of the night <S%H3915><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>" And he said, <S%H559><s%> "Here <S%H2009><s%> I am."

And He said, <S%H559><s%> "I am God, <S%H410><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of your father; do not be afraid <S%H1><s%> to go <S%H3372><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to Egypt, <S%H3381><s%> for I will make <S%H4714><s%> you a great <S%H7760><s%> nation <S%H1419><s%> there. <S%H1471><s%>

"I will go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> with you to Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and I will also <S%H1571><s%> surely <S%H5927><s%> bring <S%H5927><s%> you up again; <S%H3254><s%> and Joseph <S%H3130><s%> will close <S%H7896><s%> <S%H3027><s%> your eyes. <S%H5869><s%>"

Then Jacob <S%H3290><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%> from Beersheba; <S%H884><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> carried <S%H5375><s%> their father Jacob <S%H1><s%> and their little <S%H3290><s%> ones <S%H2945><s%> and their wives, <S%H2945><s%> in the wagons <S%H802><s%> which <S%H5699><s%> Pharaoh <S%H834><s%> had sent <S%H6547><s%> to carry <S%H7971><s%> him.

And they took <S%H3947><s%> their livestock <S%H4735><s%> and their property, <S%H7399><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they had acquired <S%H7408><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his descendants <S%H2233><s%> with him:

his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his grandsons <S%H1121><s%> with him, his daughters <S%H1323><s%> and his granddaughters, <S%H1323><s%> <S%H1121><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his descendants <S%H2233><s%> he brought <S%H935><s%> with him to Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

Now these <S%H428><s%> are the names <S%H8034><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> and his sons, <S%H1121><s%> who went <S%H935><s%> to Egypt: <S%H4714><s%> Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> Jacob's first-born.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben: <S%H7205><s%> Hanoch <S%H2585><s%> and Pallu <S%H6396><s%> and Hezron <S%H2696><s%> and Carmi. <S%H3756><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon: <S%H8095><s%> Jemuel <S%H3223><s%> and Jamin <S%H3226><s%> and Ohad <S%H161><s%> and Jachin <S%H3199><s%> and Zohar <S%H6714><s%> and Shaul <S%H7586><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of a Canaanite <S%H3669><s%> woman.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi: <S%H3878><s%> Gershon, <S%H1648><s%> Kohath, <S%H6955><s%> and Merari. <S%H4847><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah: <S%H3063><s%> Er <S%H6147><s%> and Onan <S%H209><s%> and Shelah <S%H7956><s%> and Perez <S%H6557><s%> and Zerah <S%H2226><s%> (but Er <S%H6147><s%> and Onan <S%H209><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>). And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Perez <S%H6557><s%> were Hezron <S%H2696><s%> and Hamul. <S%H2538><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Issachar: <S%H3485><s%> Tola <S%H8439><s%> and Puvvah <S%H6312><s%> and Iob <S%H3102><s%> and Shimron. <S%H9616><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zebulun: <S%H2074><s%> Sered <S%H5624><s%> and Elon <S%H356><s%> and Jahleel. <S%H3177><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Leah, <S%H3812><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> she bore <S%H3205><s%> to Jacob <S%H3290><s%> in Paddan-aram, with his daughter <S%H1323><s%> Dinah; <S%H1783><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his daughters <S%H1323><s%> [numbered] thirty-three.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad: <S%H1410><s%> Ziphion <S%H6837><s%> and Haggi, <S%H2291><s%> Shuni <S%H7764><s%> and Ezbon, <S%H675><s%> Eri <S%H6179><s%> and Arodi <S%H722><s%> and Areli. <S%H692><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Asher: <S%H836><s%> Imnah <S%H3232><s%> and Ishvah <S%H3438><s%> and Ishvi <S%H3440><s%> and Beriah <S%H1283><s%> and their sister <S%H269><s%> Serah. <S%H8294><s%> And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Beriah: <S%H1283><s%> Heber <S%H2268><s%> and Malchiel. <S%H4439><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zilpah, <S%H2153><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> Laban <S%H3837><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> to his daughter <S%H1323><s%> Leah; <S%H3812><s%> and she bore <S%H3205><s%> to Jacob <S%H3290><s%> these <S%H428><s%> sixteen <S%H8337><s%> <S%H6240><s%> persons. <S%H5315><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jacob's wife <S%H802><s%> Rachel: <S%H7354><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> and Benjamin. <S%H1144><s%>

Now to Joseph <S%H3130><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> were born <S%H3205><s%> Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> and Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> Asenath, <S%H621><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Potiphera, <S%H6319><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%> of On, <S%H204><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> to him.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin: <S%H1144><s%> Bela <S%H1106><s%> and Becher <S%H1071><s%> and Ashbel, <S%H788><s%> Gera <S%H1617><s%> and Naaman, <S%H5283><s%> Ehi <S%H278><s%> and Rosh, <S%H9537><s%> Muppim <S%H4649><s%> and Huppim <S%H2650><s%> and Ard. <S%H714><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Rachel, <S%H7354><s%> who <S%H834><s%> were born <S%H3205><s%> to Jacob; <S%H3290><s%> [there were] fourteen <S%H702><s%> <S%H6240><s%> persons <S%H5315><s%> in all. <S%H3605><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Dan: <S%H1835><s%> Hushim. <S%H9127><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Naphtali: <S%H5321><s%> Jahzeel <S%H3183><s%> and Guni <S%H1476><s%> and Jezer <S%H3337><s%> and Shillem. <S%H8006><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bilhah, <S%H1090><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> Laban <S%H3837><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> to his daughter <S%H1323><s%> Rachel, <S%H7354><s%> and she bore <S%H3205><s%> these <S%H428><s%> to Jacob; <S%H3290><s%> [there were] seven <S%H7651><s%> persons <S%H5315><s%> in all. <S%H3605><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the persons <S%H5315><s%> belonging to Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> who came <S%H935><s%> to Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> his direct <S%H3409><s%> descendants, <S%H3318><s%> not including <S%H905><s%> the wives <S%H802><s%> of Jacob's sons, <S%H1121><s%> [were] sixty-six persons <S%H5315><s%> in all, <S%H3605><s%>

and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> who <S%H834><s%> were born <S%H3205><s%> to him in Egypt <S%H4714><s%> were two; <S%H8147><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the persons <S%H5315><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> who came <S%H935><s%> to Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> [were] seventy. <S%H7657><s%>

Now he sent <S%H7971><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> to point <S%H3384><s%> out [the way] before <S%H6440><s%> him to Goshen; <S%H1657><s%> and they came <S%H935><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of Goshen. <S%H1657><s%>

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> prepared <S%H631><s%> his chariot <S%H4818><s%> and went <S%H5927><s%> up to Goshen <S%H1657><s%> to meet <S%H7122><s%> his father Israel; <S%H1><s%> as soon as he appeared <S%H3478><s%> before <S%H7200><s%> him, he fell <S%H413><s%> on his neck <S%H5307><s%> and wept <S%H6677><s%> on his neck <S%H1058><s%> a long <S%H6677><s%> time. <S%H5750><s%>

Then Israel <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> "Now <S%H6471><s%> let me die, <S%H4191><s%> since <S%H310><s%> I have seen <S%H7200><s%> your face, <S%H6440><s%> that you are still <S%H5750><s%> alive. <S%H2416><s%>"

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his brothers <S%H251><s%> and to his father's household, <S%H1004><s%> "I will go <S%H5927><s%> up and tell <S%H5046><s%> Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and will say <S%H559><s%> to him, 'My brothers <S%H251><s%> and my father's household, <S%H1004><s%> who <S%H834><s%> [were] in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> have come <S%H935><s%> to me;

and the men <S%H376><s%> are shepherds, <S%H7462><s%> for they have been <S%H1961><s%> keepers <S%H376><s%> of livestock; <S%H4735><s%> and they have brought <S%H935><s%> their flocks <S%H6629><s%> and their herds <S%H1241><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that they have.'
"And it shall come <S%H1961><s%> about when <S%H3588><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> calls <S%H7121><s%> you and says, <S%H559><s%> 'What <S%H4100><s%> is your occupation <S%H4639><s%>?'

that you shall say, <S%H559><s%> 'Your servants <S%H5650><s%> have been <S%H1961><s%> keepers <S%H376><s%> of livestock <S%H4735><s%> from our youth <S%H5271><s%> even until <S%H5704><s%> now, <S%H6258><s%> both <S%H1571><s%> we and our fathers,' that you may live <S%H1><s%> in the land <S%H3427><s%> of Goshen; <S%H776><s%> for every <S%H1657><s%> shepherd <S%H3605><s%> is loathsome <S%H7462><s%> to the Egyptians. <S%H8441><s%> "
